name: Starwulf: Seeker of Secret Space
storyline:
Ever since I was a kid, I heard tales of a lone space pilot embarking on an epic journey through distant galaxies, leading to a mysterious realm known as secret space. That pilot returned with a mind-blowing ship that had everyone doubting its existence. Yet, they remained tight-lipped about its origin, earning the nickname 'Starwulf.' Those stories stuck with me, and I knew deep down that one day, I'd follow in their footsteps and become a legend.

Then everything went sideways. Hostile forces from a forsaken galaxy invaded our planet, turning my family into slaves. No one came to help, not from nearby planets or the so-called galactic society. And where was I? Stuck grinding through a space pilot course on some remote rock, unable to do a damn thing as my home descended into chaos. Determination fueled my tears of rage and sorrow, and I swore an oath—I'd be there, and I'd be there soon. Even if it meant walking the path of a legend and returning with a kick-ass ship that could wipe out any enemy fleet. I was going to free my people, no matter the cost.

And so, my heroic journey began. I ventured from star system to star system, navigating treacherous galaxies like a true daredevil. I scavenged cargo from uninhabited planets and cashed in by selling it at space stations. Slowly but surely, I honed my skills and upgraded my ship to face the perils of those distant realms. Those mystical energy items I stumbled upon in hyperspace? Turns out they had a hidden power—they could freeze time. I started to wonder if they held the key to unlocking the path to secret space.
summary:
The game is an unique combination of brick puzzles, space combat and trading. Destroy asteroids and solve planet puzzles with brick guns and missiles. Collect and sell cargo, improve your ship, travel through hostile galaxies and find a way to the secret space - complete your main quest.

Your mission is to take back your home planet from hostile race. They invaded your planet and no-one helped. Since you are alone, you need to follow the path of legendary star crusader - Starwulf. Find the way to secret space in the edge of known space and come back with legendary ship powerful enough to take out any enemy - and take back your home planet.
